Vulois

Vulois slammed his fists against the CF door.

"Please! Let me in! I need to speak with Battera and Cybershark. I 
don't have much time!"
______________________________________________________________________
Trainers

Prebon lost it.

"ENOUGH! I will not tolerate this! You are going to get along, or I 
will put you both in the brig! Now, to the plan. Everyone, here."
Prebon handed everyone except Spears a small circular device. The 
Trainers pt it on.
"This is a cloaking device. It will mask your signature. Now, I will 
have Spears tied up and with me. My Trainers plus Savage will be far 
in the back, listening to what takes place. They will come forward 
just incase Ramulus brought back up. Slayer, you will be up on a 
ledge, scoping at Ramulus. As soon as you get a decent shot, kill 
him. Now let's move out!"

Prebon and The Trainers left the base. Prebon called for Savage, and 
when he came put a cloaking device on his skin.

"All of you can get on him. Remember to activate them when we get 
closer to the area."
